name: My Love For Your Clout
description:
im sorry i made this. im so sorry. please

FEATURES

  • over 11 DATEABLE GIRLS
  • unlimited replayability
  • SECRET!!??!?!? ENDING!!!!!!!!!!!
  • AN EXTRAS SCREEN WITH EVEN. MORE. STUFF

how to mod:

  1. upload your (JPEG ONLY) image to the images folder with your girls name as the filename
  2. reload and enjoy

credits: minute for code and writing. tophat for design and flavor.
